error-passphrase-length: Passphrase must contain at least 8 characters.
invalid-session-generic: Session expired. Please rescan the QR code.
invalid-session: Session invalid. Please rescan the QR code.
no-context: No connection context. Please go to /connect to scan the node's QR code.
unable-connect-api: Unable to connect to the API.
missing-jwt: Missing JWT. Please rescan the QR code.
